Test Name: Signal Transducer and Activator of Transcription 6 (STAT6) Testing
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue blocks or slides, or extracted RNA
Purpose: To assess STAT6 protein or gene expression for diagnostic evaluation, ensuring accurate and reproducible laboratory results.
Container: Paraffin block cassette or microscope slide for FFPE specimens; screw-cap microcentrifuge tube for RNA
Equipment: Immunohistochemistry staining platform, Real-Time PCR instrument, microscope
